Package se.liu.ida.hefquin.service

Class HeFQUINServlet

java.lang.Object
jakarta.servlet.GenericServlet
jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServlet
se.liu.ida.hefquin.service.HeFQUINServlet
All Implemented Interfaces:
jakarta.servlet.Servlet, jakarta.servlet.ServletConfig, Serializable
public class HeFQUINServlet extends jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServlet
Servlet for handling SPARQL queries via HTTP GET and POST requests. Supports multiple result formats and integrates with the HeFQUIN engine.
See Also:
